Arbor AWS instances

There are currently three main Arbor instances available to use for free.

Arbor

Our main Arbor instance.

Arbor classic

"Arbor classic" is based on a previous version of our workflow manager.

Arbor dev

"Arbor dev" is an environment for testing new applications and workflow approaches.
